campaign.story:
This‌ ‌catchy,‌ ‌witty‌ ‌compilation‌ ‌of‌ ‌inventions,‌ ‌filled‌ ‌with‌ ‌beautiful‌ ‌illustrations,‌ ‌is‌ ‌a‌ ‌wonderful‌ ‌gift‌ ‌for‌ ‌collectors,‌ ‌enthusiasts,‌ ‌and‌ ‌curious‌ ‌minds.‌
Story
Have you ever imagined visiting the past with full knowledge of modern information and technology? If you told people from the Middle Ages or Ancient Egypt about a telephone, a car, or electricity, they would take you for a deity or a superhero. But do you actually know how these things work?
As a child, before bed, I used to imagine with my dad what things like bowstrings would be made of in ancient times. In the morning, looking it up, we would be startled to discover that bowstrings were made of veins and if you wanted instead to make one from gunpowder ingredients you had to urinate on hay!

As I got older, I got into mechanics and discovered that many apparently simple things are based on brilliant ideas. All the discoveries and inventions that seemed incredible and almost magical when I was a child actually were just as fantastical as I imagined!

I realized that most people knew very little about how such inventions of our civilization as a plow, a mill, a blast furnace or glass are made and how they work. I began making a list of the most amazing inventions I would like to tell my children about. Later I added illustrations, which became more and more bizarre and mysterious. After some time, I finished a draft of The Book of Incredible Inventions and Discoveries. 

Now I want to share this book with everyone who hasn’t lost their juvenile curiosity and love for mystery. If you are as fascinated by technical, military, medical and artistic inventions as I am, you definitely will love The Book of Incredible Inventions and Discoveries and The Ultimate Guide to Rebuilding a Civilization. This book is an illustrated encyclopedia of mechanisms, processes and materials that have played a significant role in human history.
There is no other book like this. Currently, information about inventions is scattered here and there in boring textbooks and manuals that are neither understandable nor inspiring. The Book of Incredible Inventions and Discoveries presents the most meaningful facts about our culture combined with out-of-this-world ideas and fabulous illustrations. It is the first treatise of its kind on these spectacular magical inventions. Only with your help will we  be able to create this exceptional book.
Vsevolod  Co-founder of The Book

The Book is a unique artifact similar to the most mysterious and mantic books of humankind. The visual symbolism of the book connects it to the prominent fifteen-century Voynich manuscript while its uncommon and original ideas are similar to the Summa Technologiae of Stanisław Lem. The book is also influenced by the aesthetics of the renowned Codex Seraphinianus. The Ultimate Guide is a real masterpiece and an endless source of inspiration.

On the pages of The Ultimate Guide you will find visual instructions for making handy mechanisms and materials in case you lose them or forget. With over 400 pages of detailed and catchy illustrations, you will forget about everything and bury yourself in the book. You won’t stop thinking of what you saw.
This section is all about how to be healthy, cheerful, and fresh. Here you’ll find out how to give mouth-to-mouth resuscitation without getting punched in the nose. You’ll learn how to remove your appendix if you don’t need it anymore. We’ll tell you which mushrooms are tasty and which mushrooms are fun (what are mushrooms and what are shrooms). We’ll teach you yoga and Chinese needle therapy. Believe us, all of this knowledge will come in handy in the ruins of the post-apocalyptic world! (not to mention in the modern world, given the cost of medical insurance). We’ll also explain how to make gypsum, glue, penicillin or even all three together from scratch.
The whole world is a big chemistry lab and the only limit here is your lack of knowledge. If there’s sand under your feet, you can make glass. If you see trees around you, it’s a step from there to making paper. The magic of our civilization, which is electricity, can also be made from easily accessible materials. There are tons of ways to make it and we’ll reveal the most original one.
Researchers have concluded that human brain development was always influenced by laziness and greed. We want to have as much as possible with minimal effort and that’s what makes us geniuses. Mills and water pumps will do the work for you. The combustion engine will help you in traveling any distance. Cameras made of boxes and paper with photosensitive surfaces will immortalize your successes
In all the worlds of the Multiverse in which this book will be published, we’ve agreed that killing people isn’t cool. We wish these inventions never appeared, but still….The trebuchet is pretty darn good. To create saltpeter, which is the main gunpowder component, all it takes is hay and human urine. How long will you have to pee in the pit full of hay? You’ll find this out in The Ultimate Guide. By the way, did you know that the alchemist who discovered gunpowder thought he was creating the elixir of life? Well, if you throw pots full of gunpowder at your enemies, you’ll become immortal (for a while).
The home of ancient man began from fire, so if you don’t want to be dumber than your ancestors you need to learn how to use flint and steel. If all goes smoothly, you’ll be able to build a log house, weave a rug, mould houseware out of clay and build a boat. You’ll learn the art of tying knots and using natural dyes. But above all, you’ll learn how to construct a unique top-class mousetrap, so rodents won’t have any chance. (Failing to do that, read about cat domestication in the Farming section.)

It’s said that wheat domesticated humans rather than the opposite. Agriculture made us who we are today, so in this book you’ll find a detailed description of grain types and animal farming principles. You’ll learn to make fishing nets, help to deliver calves, procure salt and honey. But first you should learn to brew the best-ever wheat beer. (Which will literally be the best beer in the world since you’ll be the only brewer after the fall of civilization)
Life is not only about surviving; it’s also about not dying of boredom. There will be fewer fights in your survivor camp if you give people cards and chess. Your children won’t set fire to your house (built thanks to the instructions of the Hearth and Home section) because they will be playing ball or flying a kite. You’ll become a local movie mogul if you make a phenakistiscope, a device that creates the illusion of motion. By the way! We’ll tell you how to make a vibrator.


There is nothing similar to the sound of the Australian didg. It’s literally the voice of spirits. This musical instrument exists in all the worlds of the Multiverse, so make sure to read a manual on how to make it. The same applies to the jaw harp, which can be found in the history of any nation on the earth and beyond. During your interworld journey a sitar and a bell will come in handy too. Tell whomever you meet about the music theory of our world and don’t forget to ask about their notation too. 

Rituals, traditions, and etiquette are as significant as mechanisms and materials. The most basic and peculiar inventions of human communication were collected in The Ultimate Guide. How do you tie a tie to make a good impression? What is the philosophy behind fashion? What are the rules of setting a table and marking the road? How exactly do you carry out seppuku in the way that will most impress others?
A Dutch philosopher Johan Huizinga in his book Homo Ludens proved that games appeared long before culture. People enjoyed games and invented a gillion of different games in the ensuing thousand years. Many games also keep arcane knowledge. For example, card suits depict archetypes of the human psyche, chessmen talk about the social organization and hierarchy. You’ll be able to rule the whole world if you know how the main games of humanity, such as football or Monopoly, work and what rules they have.

People had not yet invented writing when they discovered that fried meat was much better than raw and that fermented fruit juice dissipated sorrow and made them sleep like a baby. Over time, cooking has become a real art that requires imagination and ingenuity. Asians held raw fish in a pressing machine for weeks to make sushi. Arab nomads occasionally discovered cheese recipe by keeping milk in bags made of sheep’s stomachs. And don’t forget to learn the recipe of the main food invention, which is bread. Without bread you won’t be able to make your new world fully civilized. 
The intriguing illustrations that combine engineering drawings and medieval art depict the structure of devices and materials in many forms throughout the many worlds of the Multiverse. What does it mean? According to The Ultimate Guide, people find new ideas in the world’s information realm rather than come up with new ones. This means that development of these ideas isn’t connected to anything really. They can appear out of the blue in different worlds of the Multiverse.
In one of these worlds, medieval peasants work fields with tills attached to bicycles. In another world, gladiators of the Colosseum fight under stadium lights. There is a world where indium-gallium alloys are the essence of microelectronics instead of silicon. In one more world zeppelin became the main means of transport when humanity discovered a cheap way to produce helium as opposed to explosive hydrogen. On the pages of The Book of Incredible Inventions and Discoveries you’ll find tons of such examples and probably will think that similar ideas have come to your mind before.
It is made for satisfying curiosity, widening the horizons of your mind, drawing inspiration and teleporting from world to world.
This book will make an excellent gift for all those who are keen on art, technology, history and such puzzling sciences as semiotics and hermeneutics.
It is made for satisfying curiosity, widening the horizones of your mind, drawing inspiration and teleporting from world to world. The book will make an excellent gift for all those who are keen on art, technology, history and even such puzzling sciencesas semiotics and hermeneutics. 
Click here to see detailed instruction on how to use add-ons if you are existing backer. 





The size of The Ultimate Guide is around 13x9 inches and 4.5 pounds. All the pages of the book will be printed on special thick 157gsm paper. This is a high-quality mat art paper, which definitely feels well and holds well. The Ultimate Guide will be a hardcover book and will have stunning matt laminated cover.
The Ultimate Guide contains knowledge of humankind and it can’t come to life without the help of people. We need the support of enthusiasts who believe in the unique future of the human mind.
                                                   In the first place, the raised money will go to the illustrators because The Book of Incredible Inventions and Discoveries forms a collection of great detailed pictures. The budget also includes the work of content editors and the book’s printing.
PLAY

The Book project is promoted by REPROJECT.


FB agencies:
This project is promoted by Jellop, the ad tech power behind the best Kickstarters with 1,100+ successful Kickstarter projects with over $460M raised between them.
"More than $50,000,000 has been raised with Sprint's support"
This campaign is promoted by Backercamp. Since 2012, Backercamp has helped 5,000+ creators make their projects a reality, raising over $300MM through crowdfunding.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
Sometimes things get a bit crazy and stuff happens that can’t be planned for: a supplier misses a deadline or a shipment gets lost. Those things could cause a delay. We are using an experienced logistics team to get our products to you. We’ll keep open and honest communication with you through our process so you know where your product is and when it’s going to get to you.

it’s also not easy to make a book which will unify the most important knowledge, but we are a team of top illustrators and cooperated with technical experts who are ready to consult us. 

Our team has a great experience in printing and we aim to make a high-quality book with impressive illustrations. 

We should warn you that the contents of The Ultimate Guide may slightly change in the making of the book. Nonetheless the book will remain its main idea and quality.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_content:
Hi everyone!
We’d like to specify what has been already done since the end of our campaign on Kickstarter in January. The first and most important thing was to assemble the team of professionals. We spent some time looking for illustrators whose drawing style would be convenient and could match with others’ styles. It was a big deal to find writers for this project as soon as our expectations were rather high and we had a huge number of unsuccessful attempts before we could find writers who can perfectly complement their texts with the illustrations. We also searched out for many researches who support both our writers and illustrators with all the needed technical information. We managed to find experts in scientific, medical, technical and social fields who constantly advise us on what information the book should include to provide readers precise and workable instructions. All in all, we have 36 people in our team, about 10 side experts and this number is constantly growing. After that came the second step of our work which unfortunately took more time and turned out to be more complicated than we expected. We all had to get used to each other to stabilize and optimize the working process. The problem on the technical side was that we’re an international team of nearly 40 people living in different countries all over the world. Time lag challenged our determination and commitment to work together on this amazing project. Finally, we won this fight but there were many others yet to come. Sometimes it was a hard time for us to learn to hear each other, we could meet every day and argue about many small and insignificant thing for hours. We still meet every day but now we can proudly say that our meetings are more productive than ever before. At last, making process is synchronized and we’re actively working on the book. We’ve made a good progress which you can see on this infographic:

Dear backers, 
It’s time for a new update! First of all, we wanted to thank you for your patience as it’s been a while since our last update.

We want to share the process with you. The Ultimate Guide is a story told by a multinarrator about a multiverse and it seems a great and interesting challenge for us to fulfill this idea.  To bring this concept to life we’re working hardly and experimenting on both levels of the book – illustrations and texts.

We think that the best way to describe our way of working process is to say that we use cut-and-try approach. We try a lot of ideas and we cancel a lot of them to obtain the best result. For example, you can see how each sketch of the Ultimate Guide is being changed and modified multiple times until it becomes a cartoon and then a complete illustration.

Dear backers,

It's time for one more survey since we've promised you a possibility to choose whether you want to place your name or name of your relative/friend in the Ultimate Guide.

We decided on Google Forms as the fastest and the easiest way to collect this information.
Link to the survey: https://forms.gle/sUQEWLnuGuDiAmjy7

Hello everyone!
We are excited to share that we are ready to start sending surveys using Kickbooster. The survey will allow you to confirm your pledge level, confirm your Kickstarter add-ons (which will be visible in your Survey Summary), and provide you with the opportunity to purchase additional add-ons. Please keep an eye out on your inbox for an email from Kickbooster throughout the week while we roll them out.

Hi there!
Not here to disturb you, just wanted you to know that we’re in a deep book production process right now. The book making turned out to be difficult but cool! All in all, our team has 22 people from all over the world and we're proud that we managed to set up this project. We meet online, guide the working process, coordinate the team and get faster in progress.

A month has passed since our Kickstarter campaign ended and we would like to share with you what we have managed to do since then. We have put together a stellar team that will work on the book over the next 8 months and are happy to introduce you….Behold!:

campaign.story:
Cute wooden models bringing nostalgia and passion for retro aesthetics.
Most of you know our Time for Machine project for our complicated metal models. However, this time we are presenting heart-warming, pleasant, and easy-to-assemble plywood models.
Back in 2012, I started my way with inventing wooden mechanical construction sets. At first, my project was unique and the only one in the world. Then, some alternatives started to appear in different parts of the world. That was how I unexpectedly found a new niche for inventors. Now, such toys are produced by more than 10 companies around the world. After that, I went through some changes in my personal life and business. In 2017, I had to start over, and created metal mechanical models. It was not easy but thanks to your support on Kickstarter, I was able to develop this project. Today my Time for Machine team and I decided to go back to the basics and created a series of models called The iconic series. 
We chose this name because plywood mechanical models became classics during these years. But how can we reinvent something that has already been invented by us? How can we make it better, more interesting and attractive? We decided to make these models light, simple and delicate. And for the first time, we added some unique colored elements, which they lacked so much. We created cool, safe, and easy-to-install colored springs. We have also added special fasteners for minifigures. Nobody has ever done this before, so we became pioneers once again and created something new and unique. Thank you for your support of our previous projects. We completed our last project really quickly: our backers received their packages in just a couple of months. We hope to complete this project promptly as well.
Denis Okhrimenko, the founder and СЕО of Time for Machine.
Inspired by sweet retro nostalgia, hippie romance, and pure technical simplicity, these construction sets became our chance to feel the soft touch of history. All the models are quite easy to assemble, perfect for every age. Every set contains plywood parts, additional colored plastic parts, manuals, and a piece of wax to make all the rotating parts move smoothly.
We want you to feel the heart and soul of these models, revisiting your childhood with its joy and precious memories. This series is a perfect combination of both elegance of the good old days and today’s minimalistic design. Laconic and stylish, every model is a great pleasure to admire. Trying to catch the vibe of the retro epoch we decided on a bold experiment with style, colors, and mechanics.

 Lord of the Rails 
Every time we travel by train, some elusive mystery hangs in the air. So this time we decided to give you a pinch of magic and create something extraordinary. Gracious and fabulous, our Lord of the Rails is destined for marvelous adventures. With this train, it’s so easy to travel the world and the seven seas, chasing your crystal dreams. 

The locomotive has an electric motor. 4 AA batteries are attached under the bottom. A small control board comes with the kit. This board contains an on/off switch and two pairs of LEDs which glow on the transparent acrylic body parts. The assembled model has a metal lever on top. This lever allows the train to move forward and backward. Also, the locomotive has a plywood switch with two speed modes: slow and fast. It moves the gear inside the mechanism and activates one of these modes. On the back and front parts of the locomotive, there is a convenient mechanism for automatic coupling with the car. You can fasten the carriage with just one move. To unhook it, you need to press the side wings on the hitch-mechanism. 
The locomotive comes with one carriage with the same colored wheels and a small part of rails for a carriage and a locomotive. To make the train move on a full-fledged railroad, you will need a complete set of rails, which we have prepared as a separate model. Nevertheless, the train can move perfectly well without these rails. For this purpose, on the lower part of the locomotive and the car, there are special locks for wheel bogies. You can lock the rotating wheelsets squarely or in reverse and make the locomotive move forward or in a circle on the floor.

LockBox
Our LockBox was born to be a good home for your secrets and memories. It may become a real challenge for everyone who is hungry for your mysteries. With this model, all your private stories, precious, intimate, and fragile, will be in good hands, so now you can feel relieved and rely on it.
This wooden safe will bring life and vibrance to every interior, enchanting everyone with the radiant beauty of its details: red, yellow, or blue colors make this model just adorable.

Raging Bull
Filled with some wild beauty, our Raging Bull is a real legend in the world of sport cars. It’s so tempting to put your fears aside, seize the day, and disappear into the night. Driving crazy fast, breaking the speed of light, you will always feel its passionate devotion. Together, you will be gorgeous and invincible. 

This wooden cowboy definitely knows how to win a good fight without hurting not a hair on your head! And moreover, it’s illegally handsome with its bright color accents: red, yellow, or blue.


Polish Legend
Embodying luxury and refined taste, Polish Legend knows the deepest desires of every car-connoisseur. This car inspires you to take a risk and go for the adventure of your dreams looking for hippie romance and the peace of mind. With this construction set, you can forget about time and plunge into another world, full of beauty and perfection. We were trying to keep the details simple and minimalistic in order not to distract your attention from bright colorful accents.

Watching its wheels move, discovering its mechanical secrets — this is all about good vibes and tranquility. This construction set is passionate and open-hearted, with its colorful plastic wheels and an opening hood and trunk. You can even put a Lego Minifigure on the passenger seat. For this purpose, we added special probes on the seats. This unexpected trick will make your car even more charming and revive the real Polish Legend.

 * Minifigures are not included.
Hot Rod
This car is brutal and charismatic, and danger is its middle name! Our Hot Rod really knows how to divide and conquer. Every part of this model is full of both elegance and glory. It may look like a rebel, bad to the bone but the truth is that deep inside it’s kind, warm, and affectionate.
This model has a beautiful body and an amazing soul and comes with enjoyable red, yellow, or blue details. You can also put a Lego Minifigure on the passenger seat. For this purpose, we added special probes on the seats. This will add some personal identity and charisma to your car.

 * Minifigures are not included.
Dream Van
All the sweet dreams come to an end. Well, fortunately, our Dream Van won’t disappear in the beams of the morning sun. Inspired by the Hippie Era, this car is light, airy, and carefree. Driving it is like listening to the music of freedom. This model is hard to resist and easy to assemble for every age. Laconic and stylish, Dream Van is full of retro nostalgia, playful colorful accents, and innocent tricks: cute plastic bands and springs.

The clockwork is hidden in the model’s back luggage compartment so you can open it up and see the finest details of the mechanism. Also, Dream Van has colorful plastic wheels: red, green, or blue. This invasion of color will take your breath away! You can even put three Lego Minifigures* inside the car. For this purpose, we added special probes: one on the driving seat and two on passenger seats. With this Lego-team, your car will look like a party bus from the 60s.


* Minifigures are not included.


More technical information:
The prototypes of these machines were not very technically complicated. We can say that our kits are quite easy to assemble too. Inside you will find plywood parts as well as additional colored plastic parts, instructions and a piece of wax to lubricate the rotating parts for smooth glide.
The clockwork is arranged in the body of each toy. For example, Polish Legend has it hidden under the hood, and Dream Van’s moving mechanism is mounted vertically in the back luggage compartment.
The wooden models have rack-and-pinion steering installed. Wheels can be turned and oriented in opposite directions so that the mechanical model will seamlessly turn during the race.

 Choosing the style of cars and the era of these models, we were nostalgic for the second half of the 20th century, the time of hippies and the heyday of local car manufacturing. It was a time of iconic cars for an entire generation. 
It was a romantic time when design bureaus created cars to meet people's needs rather than to fight for market shares. People endorsed this approach and chose the vehicles as a means of expressing themselves and their ideas.
 As a final touch, we added the possibility to put a mini-figure on the car seat. For this purpose, there are special elements on the plywood seat to secure the figurine. (Attention. Lego figure is not included)
Choose your model and your colour from our wooden DIY self-assembly kits.
Please help bring our creative project to life.
We promise that we will do everything in our power to execute this campaign to the best of our ability and on time.
The Team:
Watch a short video about our friendly team of engineers, designers and programmers, who work to create different models from metal, plywood, and models with electronic components.
PLAY


We are always looking forward to your reaction to our new developments, and we are very pleased when our designers bring you joy and you leave good feedback on websites. We try to improve new models and fix the defects of previous models that you found. Thanks to you, we've made adjustments to the instructions and changed some units and assembly methods in new developments. In all new models, the spring will be delivered in a ready-made closed drum for ease of assembly, and the same changes will be made in previous mechanisms.
We're introducing new components such as bearings, rubber, eco-leather parts, updated packaging, and updated, more user-friendly instructions with multi-language translations. We are also creating electronic models, some of which will be presented this year. During development, we keep thinking about whether you will like it and whether you will enjoy it.
.
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
While we realize the challenges associated with a Kickstarter campaign, we also possess all the necessary capabilities to produce and deliver our models. What we have:

1) Our own manufacturing facilities with increased output and many years of experience in business and project management. We are confident in our ability to produce these beautiful and unique model kits for everyone who supports us in the campaign!

2) We have a detailed plan how to proceed after the end of the project.

3) Our company’s strategy is based on our long-lasting passion for designing unique, creative models and bringing joy to people all around the world.

With the support of Kickstarter – your support – we can breathe life into these interactive models and bring joy and beauty to people all around the world!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

We have decided to close our project now and make a fresh start next year with better prices and shipping options. Yours,
Time for Machine

campaign.story:
JON SABLE, FREELANCE by MIKE GRELL 
It is official! Kickstarter Loves MIKE GRELL!
ATTENTION: 
JUST ADDED:
BONUS: Final Milestone Goal: If we cross $70,000 or reach 500 backers, we will include a free WARLORD Portfolio Slipcase with the prints! A newly designed, custom slipcase to keep those gorgeous prints nice, snug, and safe!

FINAL Add ON OF THE CAMPAIGN:
Just Add $25 to your pledge amount, and let us know you want THE WARLORD!
This epic collection is brought to you thanks to the great Grell friends and fans, Ruth and Darrin Sutherland! Check out their Mike Grell podcast:  https://www.facebook.com/warlordworlds/community/?ref=page_internal 

 UNLOCKED: NEW MILESTONE GOAL 
BONUS PREMIUM
WHEN WE REACH 450 BACKERS,
EVERYONE WHO PLEDGES HARD COPY AND ABOVE
WILL RECEIVE THIS EXCLUSIVE
GREEN ARROW AND BLACK CANARY
TRADING CARD SET BY
MIKE GRELL
AVAILABLE ONLY AS A CROWDFUNDING PREMIUM


That's right. Green Arrow and Black Canary Masterstroke Trading cards. Only available to backers of this campaign. You won't be able to get them outside of the Sable Omnibus crowdfunding projects!
All we have to do is hit, or pass, 450 backers total by the time the campaign ends, and everyone gets these for FREE, added to their final packages!



 JON SABLE FREELANCE SKETCHBOOK
Any backer who is in for physical rewards, all you have to do is add $35 to your pledge per copy of the Sketchbook. Then comment to us that you have added it, and we'll make sure you get one! (The folks who pledged at the Ultimate Fan level will get these included for free)
AND... Did you miss previous items on previous campaigns?
Well, now you can add on any of these items as well:
Prices are indicated on each item
The Grell And Grell Legion Sketchbooks are $35 each
The Grell Legion Sketchcards are $25 for each set of 27 cards
Maggie The Cat #1 (64 pages) is $10
The Pilgrim Volume 1 (80 pages) is $15
Simply add the amount for the item(s) you wish to add to your pledge, and message to let us know what item you are adding. It's that simple.

We are also on our way to Stretch Goals now!
STRETCH GOALS
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #1: $56,000! When we hit this goal, we will include an exclusive JON SABLE Omnibus collection bookmark, and an exclusive Kickstarter JON SABLE sketch card from Mike Grell!
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #2: $58,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a digital video file of a nearly 2 hour live filmed docu-interview with Mike Grell, filmed in 2018! All backers will have their names listed in the credits as special thanks! Some pledge levels include more prominent credits as well. This "Inside The Actors Studio" type interview is a perfect companion to the Eisner Award nominated "Life Is Drawing Without An Eraser" book from TwoMorrows Publishing! A must for Grell fans. (If we cross $100K, look for this film to go from downloadable, to a full DVD!)
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #3: $60,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a JON SABLE Companion, volume 1. This will include reprints of all the original letters pages from the issues within this volume, as well as a Who's Who style section of characters, and a guide to guns as seen and used in the pages of this volume, plus more bonus content like rare in-house ads from the original run, etc. A unique companion to the omnibus collection! 24 pages of color and black and white images!
UNLOCKED:STRETCH GOAL #4: $65,000!  When we hit this goal, we will include the first set (in 5 total sets) of JON SABLE FREELANCE trading cards! Unique collectibles, with characters from the series. By the time we produce all 5 volumes, you'll have a full set of  25 cards, but it all starts with this initial set of cards.
STRETCH GOAL #5: $70,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a brand new Mike Grell Jon Sable art print that will have a classic cinema poster look to it akin to classic James Bond film posters! A unique Jon Sable item for sure!

New Milestone Goal: UNLOCKED!!!!! 
We hit 400 total backers! All backers will get this exclusive Masterstroke Studios Trading Card: 
The Iconic white on black image of Jon Sable, as one of Masterstroke's Trading Cards, with Masterstroke logo on the back. This card will be a rare collectible item that joins the Maggie The Cat exclusive card, The Pilgrim un-used cover art cards, and Mike Grell's Legion of Super Heroes sketchcards!

JUST ADDED: COMIC SHOPS can get 2 or 3 copies at a deep discount! This is the only way to get copies of the Omnibus in your local comic shop! So let your favorite retailer know that they can get JON SABLE, FREELANCE Deluxe Hardcover Omnibus Volume 1 before anyone else!
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.
RETURN OF A CLASSIC FOR A NEW GENERATION
Mike Grell's JON SABLE, FREELANCE was a trailblazing comic book in the 1980s. 
JON SABLE, FREELANCE, the story of a former African hunter in the concrete jungle, was one of the earliest successes among independent comics of the 1980s.  A top seller, SABLE often saw higher sales and critical praise than Batman, Superman, Spiderman, Avengers, and many other mainstay titles. It was one of the comics of the era that helped redefine what the medium could achieve.
After successful Kickstarter campaigns to revive Mike Grell’s MAGGIE THE CAT and his collaboration with actor/writer Mark Ryan on THE PILGRIM, Grell’s Masterstroke Studios imprint is giving one of his most popular creations a massive new release: JON SABLE, FREELANCE.
It is notable that SABLE has never gotten the Deluxe Hardcover Omnibus treatment it deserves. IDW released a series of trade paperbacks in the early 2000s, and Comicmix published smaller sized paperback omnibus editions in the last decade. Masterstroke is upping the game by going for over-sized editions that will be definitive versions of the legendary series.
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.

HERE'S THE PLAN:
Over the next couple of years, Masterstroke Studios will be releasing JON SABLE, FREELANCE, the definitive omnibus collection in 5 volumes, with the final volume being launched in time for Mike Grell's 75th birthday in September of 2022.

Each volume will consist of approximately 400 pages of content, including all of the issues, all of the covers, and heaps of bonus materials (some never before seen). These editions will be over-sized (think DC Absolute Editions), showing the pages bigger than they have ever been seen before. Each volume will have a dustjacket with new art by Mike Grell. Key issues will have commentary from Grell about the story and behind the scenes insights. And there will be lots of other goodies thrown in as well (including a companion book of original letters column pages, old house ads, and other rare bits and pieces from the history of JON SABLE, FREELANCE!)

VOLUME 1 covers issues #1 - #13, completing the first major story arc of Sable, from his origins as an Olympic athlete, to his life and lose living with his family in Africa, to his personal death wish as a gun-for-hire upon his return to America. The first volume concludes with Sable's return to Vietnam to find a man missing in action.

Grell's gritty, yet emotionally grounded tales are a slice of mid-1980s current events, politics and intrigue, blended with action and adventure. The entire series is a unique time capsule of an era, while also remaining relevant and fresh for a new generation. 

THIS KICKSTARTER
This is where it all begins. This Kickstarter is to fund the creation and production of Volume 1 (and possibly Volume 2 if we cross $100K on this campaign) of the Deluxe Hardcover Omnibus series.
We've spent months planning every detail of this campaign to make it as efficient and straightforward as possible.

We've set the price point at a comparable retail market price for other similar volumes rather than elevate the price point on Kickstarter, as so many projects do.  It is not uncommon to pay upwards of $30 for a single issue of a comic on Kickstarter (which is based on the cost of creation for writers and artists. Comics are not cheap to create and publish, no doubt about it). But since this material already exists, the costs are a bit lower for us. This means we can focus on making the presentation of the material the best it can be. We can also begin advance work on the next volumes, as we prepare to launch them in the coming months.

We see fans who contribute to projects get frustrated when they see the same books available months later for a fraction of what they pledged. And while these editions will be made widely available later on down the line, you will pay the same price to support it here that you would to buy it next year in your local comic shops and other retailers. AND... these editions will contain Kickstarter exclusive aspects that those others won't. These will be the first, and rarest versions of the omnibus set, guaranteed. 
A unique page of art in the front of the book will be exclusive to this Kickstarter, and some copies of this Kickstarter backed volume will come with an exclusive bookplate that will be signed and numbered. As well, the names of backers of this project will be listed in the back of the book, thanking them for their frontline support of Mike Grell's work. As well, some fans can get special recognition, including sketches of their likenesses being used for an exclusive trading card set! 
There are many perks beyond just getting the book. You can get a limited number of original Grell commissioned sketches (some of them inside the book itself, making your copy all the more unique).

This is a massive project that we're breaking up over two years and five volumes, that, when complete, will be the final word on the original JON SABLE adventures.
Early bird pricing saves you even more. If you pledge in the first 48 hours, you end up saving an additional $25 on the book, which will retail for $100 down the road when offered for Local Comic Shops.

What you get: 
JON SABLE, FREELANCE Masterstroke Edition Volume 1.
There are many other pledge levels that include sketches, other Masterstroke publications you may have missed, and a whole host of other unique opportunities to be backers at higher levels and get even more out of this amazing project!
As we surpass our funding goal, and unlock Stretch Goals, there are even more great surprises in store, from trading cards, a Sable poster, a feature length Mike Grell video interview, trading cards, art portfolio prints, and even a chance to get Volume 2 of the omnibus set at a discounted rate after we pass a certain funding goal.
Lots of cool things await! And this is just the beginning.

EARLY BIRD BACKER BONUS!
The first 100 Backers will get an exclusive Sable art print by Mike Grell that will be exclusive to this campaign! A one of a kind (well, one of one hundred) piece, this will be a great bonus for fans!

 DID YOU MISS THE OTHER MASTERSTROKE KICKSTARTERS?
Fear not! You can catch up on everything Grell right here with this campaign.
That's right. You will be able to get Maggie The Cat, The Pilgrim, Jon Sable black and white bonus comic, Rules of The Hunt, The Mike Grell Sketchbook, The Legion of Super Heroes Sketchbook and Sketch Cards, and more!
There's a pledge level that catches you up, but we will also be announcing ways to add on individual items you may have missed along the way!

SOME OTHER SURPRISES AWAIT
Working from original plates of the page art, Mike Grell will be able to go back into select issues and pages, and clean up some of the art, making it sharper, clearer, and better looking than ever before.
We're mindful of not altering the original art, but rather we are planning to lovingly improve the art, colors and pages where needed to make this the best looking, and most definitive version of Sable.
In future volumes of the set, there will new color added to some issues, as well as new artwork. (Keep reading...)
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.
Each of the planned five volumes will clock in at around 400 pages. They will be larger than we’ve ever seen SABLE, measuring approximately 8.5 by 12.25 inches (the same size as the DC Comics Absolute Edition releases) with glossy interior pages, rare materials (including never before seen artwork), all new covers, and dust jackets that will line up to form a complete image when placed in order on a shelf. Each volume will retail for $100.

JON SABLE'S Back!
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.
That's right! Mike Grell's classic is making a triumphant return in a deluxe hardcover format for the first time!
Images are shown for representation effect. Final art for the cover will be revealed in the near future.

The original cover to JSF #1 from First Comics back in 1982!
A gallery of original covers for the issues that will be contained within Volume 1
 This two page spread from Jon Sable, Freelance #1 has been lovingly preserved, while also increasing the quality from the original newsprint pages to a bright glossy finish! This is the best Sable has ever looked!
 The original cover to the SABEL novel from 2000. It has been revised and re-edited for an all new release, and you can get it digitally though this campaign!

 But it shouldn't scare you, the fans! It should excite you! Jon Sable's triumphant return will be a FAN driven publication! By the fans, for the fans! This is the ultimate presentation of JON SABLE!
This is how the original series stacks up. Now, imagine it bigger, bolder, brighter, and more badass than ever before! 

 THE FUTURE
With 5 total volumes needed to collect the entire run of 56 original issues, 12 additional issues, and other bonus appearances (anyone remember Mike Grell's 5 page in "Word Warriors" literacy awareness comic in 1987? How about that 5 page Hero Initiative benefit comic in 2014? The black and white "Rules Of The Hunt" bonus comic from the "Maggie The Cat" Kickstarter? Yes, we will have it ALL!) of Jon Sable, each volume will be approximately 400 pages in length, with extensive bonuses.

Astute fans will recall that late in the original run of JSF, Mike Grell left the art chores behind, bringing in a host of talented artists to draw the issues. They were all great artists in their own right, but it just wasn't the same without Grell at the pencil.

Well, we're about to make an announcement that will blow the minds of fans:
Volumes 4 and 5 of this omnibus series will feature issues of JSF, redrawn by Mike Grell himself!
We've got Stephen B Scott along to assist with finishes to Mike's pencils for some of the backgrounds and some of the issues. Mike will be fully drawing several of the key issues, and providing pencils for the rest. This will be like seeing 13 issues worth of JSF the way that they were meant to be, for the first time in over 30 years! This is a unique opportunity for Mike to go back and do those issues the way he envisioned them from the start!
I'm excited just typing that. Honestly, as a fan (and editor for the project) I feel like we're going to discover a lost treasure of Mike Grell art! And I don't know of any other instances of artists reaching that far back and redrawing whole issues of comics.

But it all starts here, with Volume 1. We need to fund this project, and get the printing presses rolling on this set of omnibus editions. In many ways, this campaign will be the foundation upon which all future Mike Grell Masterstroke Studios projects will be built. So, we need you, the fans, now more than ever! The more successful this initial campaign is, the more poised for bringing you the absolute, ultimate, best SABLE possible.
This is the moment all Grell fans have been waiting for!
STRETCH GOALS
STRETCH GOAL #1: $56,000! When we hit this goal, we will include an exclusive JON SABLE Omnibus collection bookmark, and an exclusive Kickstarter JON SABLE sketch card from Mike Grell!
STRETCH GOAL #2: $58,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a digital video file of a nearly 2 hour live filmed docu-interview with Mike Grell, filmed in 2018! All backers will have their names listed in the credits as special thanks! Some pledge levels include more prominent credits as well. This "Inside The Actors Studio" type interview is a perfect companion to the Eisner Award nominated "Life Is Drawing WIthout An Eraser" book from TwoMorrows Publishing! A must for Grell fans. (If we cross $100K, look for this film to go from downloadable, to a full DVD!)
STRETCH GOAL #3: $60,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a JON SABLE Companion, volume 1. This will include reprints of all the original letters pages from the issues within this volume, as well as a Who's Who style section of characters, and a guide to guns as seen and used in the pages of this volume, plus more bonus content like rare in-house ads from the original run, etc. A unique companion to the omnibus collection! 24 pages of color and black and white images!
STRETCH GOAL #4: $65,000!  When we hit this goal, we will include the first set (in 5 total sets) of JON SABLE FREELANCE trading cards! Unique collectibles, with characters from the series. By the time we produce all 5 volumes, you'll have a full set of  25 cards, but it all starts with this initial set of cards.
STRETCH GOAL #5: $70,000! When we hit this goal, we will include a brand new Mike Grell Jon Sable art print that will have a classic cinema poster look to it akin to classic James Bond film posters! A unique Jon Sable item for sure!
STRETCH GOAL #6: $75,000! When we hit this goal, we will include the first 2 limited art print plates of the JON SABLE art portfolio. Once all 5 volumes of the omnibus are finished, there will be a full portfolio (in a unique slipcase) of 10 art prints. 
AND WE HAVE EVEN MORE STRETCH GOALS PLANNED, SO KEEP AN EYE OUT....
We have some MAJOR plans for Stretch Goals that go up to $100,000, and include some amazing items! So help us get funded, and we will reveal a new Stretch Goal each day over the next 5 days following hitting our funding goal!
* Note: Stretch Goal rewards are only available to backers who pledge on physical levels, not digital.

MILESTONE GOALS:
Be sure and keep an eye out for bonus items being offered when we hit certain milestones along the way! (Milestones are, for example, when we hit our 250th backer, 500th backer, etc.)

All of the material for this volume already exists, and is ready for publication. Some of the bonuses and perks will take a little time to complete, but we are aiming to get this book into the hands of the backers by Christmas! What a Christmas gift that will be for Grell fans, right?
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

updates.update_userinfo: Mike is on the road again soon
updates.update_content:
Not directly related to this project (which is still being worked on steadily), but as things are getting back to somewhat normal after about 16 months of decidedly abnormal life on planet Earth, Mike has got a few upcoming appearances:
 https://mikegrell.com/news/?p=489 
The big one is GalaxyCon in Raleigh, NC on July 29 - August 1. That's a month away!

updates.update_userinfo: No update update. But thought you should know
updates.update_content:
I wanted to check in and let you all know that work continues on the project. The recolor/touch up process is very time intensive. The fact that the first 13 issues were originally on newsprint, and were colored with that in mind WAAAAY back in the day, has created some interesting obstacles in preserving versus upscaling the colors.
Glenn Hauman is doing a tremendous job.
Lucky for us (and you guys), starting with issue 14, JON SABLE went to a higher grade of paper, and better coloring overall. So, the future volumes will be considerably easier to touch up.

Just in case anyone is sending messages and not getting replies, let me give you all a heads up:
We are going to send out info as Updates (like this one) when we have it, so incoming questions will largely go unanswered unless you post comments ONLY under one of the updates. That way I (Jeff) will be able to access and see them easily. Mike can't go through all the messages and reply to them, as his focus must remain on the work and not the Kickstarter in box. I post updates when we have them, and respond to comments here.

Good things come to those who wait. That's the age old saying.
Sable progress continues, albeit slower than we would like, but we are taking an approach of getting it right, rather than getting it fast.
We're looking at proofs, re-sizing, tweaking, and paying attention to every little detail. We want to get this one perfect. And with the knowledge that once we get Volume 1 locked down, the future Volumes will be easier to produce because we will have set the whole format in stone after this first one.

Just saw the proofs for the trading cards for this campaign, and they look great. 
Prepping the Warlord prints for production.
Working on the companion book, revisiting those old letters columns.
A proof copy has been produced to get a feel for exact size and weight, even though the pages inside that proof are not the final pages.

Hope everyone is doing great.
Work continues on the SABLE hardcover, as the color process continues, and we assemble the bonus goodies that were part of the Kickstarter campaign.
Since the production end of things is taking a little longer than we would have liked, I thought it might be a great time to reveal an early look at the documentary video interview with Mike from 2018.

Update time.
We are about to get a look at a physical proof for the book itself. This is a slightly more time consuming process, but one we deem necessary in order to make sure we get the absolute best quality product. After all, we're not kidding around here. This is intended to be "definitive" when it comes to Jon Sable Freelance.
The remaster/recolor process is still underway, and looking great. But it is delicate work. And Glenn Hauman is doing a masterful job of taking every inch of every page and carefully modernizing the colors without changing them from the original Janice Cohen colors.

First, the good news: We hope to have some of the remastered/re-colored pages to show soon. Perhaps even a side by side comparison for you to see exactly what work is being done. This first volume is one that we want to make sure we get right, and Glenn Hauman of ComicMix is doing slow, patient work, panel by panel, page by page, to modernize the color palate while still maintaining the original colors of the books.
We're talking about issues of comics that were originally newsprint (which absorbs colors in ways that can make the pages look murky and over-saturated) being updated to look as good as any modern comic, but without entirely recoloring with modern technics.

All surveys have gone out, as of just moments ago.
Please fill them out fully and return them as soon as possible.
We are, hopefully, about a month away from having the book ready for the printer. Obviously, any number of things could come up and create small delays, but we are hopeful to keep on a tight schedule.

Hey folks -
Just to keep you in the loop, we are continually moving forward with all the work involved in completing this project.  We've seen the first few pages of remastered colors, and they look great! We are doing the delicate balance of preserving the original, while improving the colors without changing the look of the original pages.  I saw a totally re-colored page from Sal Buscema's Conan art, and thought they went too far and changed too much with the new colors. It doesn't even look like the same art anymore. And we're talking special care here to make sure that does not happen to Sable. Needless to say, this is taking some time, and a lot of attention to detail. In the end it will be well worth it.

campaign.story:
3D printing is accessible to most anyone these days with low-cost 3D printers flooding the market. This is a course that is designed to help anyone learn where to begin with 3d printing and how you can get started. You will learn how to choose a 3D printer for your needs, you will learn some 3D modeling, and you will learn various other 3D technologies. In this course there will be videos detailing many of the 3D design tools available. You will learn how to repair designs so they can be printed better. This is a course that is meant for a beginner but also for 3D modeling professionals wishing to enter the 3D printing world. 
What you will learn:
Understanding 3D printing
What you can make
3D printing technologies
3D modeling and scanning
Watertight 3D designs
Repairing 3D designs
Exporting your files
Bonus Woman Hero Bust STL 3D Printable File and Process Video
Other 3D Printing Courses
These courses can be added to your reward levels to expand your knowledge. All these courses are interlinked and complement each other. 
Remasted Course 
This course is a remastered version of the previous successful Kickstarter campaign of Learning 3D Printing from Scratch. With your help I was able to make the two last courses mentioned above with some higher quality equipment. So now I want to go back and upgrade my main 3D printing course with the new quality equipment I have now. All pledges help fund more courses that help the community learn. Thank you!

campaign.story:
THIS CAMPAIGN IS FOR THE PHYSICAL AS WELL AS THE DIGITAL GRAPHIC NOVEL! 
Sorry about any confusion, but every tier comes WITH the digital version. The subsequent descriptions are for PHYSICAL tiers! Please note as you check out your options!

Hello! And welcome the very first MONSTER HUNT KICKSTARTER campaign!  My name is Mike S. Miller, I'm a 28 year veteran of the comic book industry, best known for my artwork in the NYTimes best selling, and #1 digital comic book in the world, INJUSTICE: GODS AMONG US, and INJUSTICE 2 for DC COMICS.  I'm also still the cover artist for A GAME OF THRONES.
Injustice: Gods Among Us. The most iconic image from the series, by Mike S. Miller
Cover from 'A Game of Thrones' comic series
I'm from San Diego, California, where I live with my amazing and beautiful wife and 5 insane children who pull me in every direction!  I've gone rogue from the mainstream comics plantation, and have struck out on this new venture to reshape the very nature of comicdom itself!  What's that you say?  Aiming a little high, am I?  Well, I figure if I aim for the moon, I might hit the top of the mountain.  But either way, it's a long, steep climb, and I'll need your help to keep this thing going!
MONSTER HUNT 2: LET'S GET KRAKEN!
Bringing together one of the industry's most renowned and legendary scribes, Inkpot and Two-time Eisner award-winning Mike Baron of Nexus, Badger, Punisher, Action Comics, the Flash, and too many others to name...
Alongside newcomer and fan-favorite phenom Matthew Weldon, artist of Punchline for Antarctic Press,
directed by Mike S. Miller. Monster Hunt: Let's Get Kraken brings together Lonestar and his Unknown Soldiers together with Doug TenNapel's Bigfoot Bill and a few of his cryptid friends as they join forces with Mike Baron and Steve Rude's intergalactic executioner, and one of the most popular independent comic characters of all time: NEXUS!  Bound together by fate to save the world from the galactic devourer: GOURMANDO!!!
Join us for this epic, galaxy-spanning, dimension-hopping, mind-bending adventure that's guaranteed to grab you by the throat and never let you go!
Four epic covers brought to you by the creative team and other fan-favorite artists of the independent comics world!
FULL COLOR 48pp
Cover A: Matthew Weldon
Matthew Weldon double-page cover spread (virgin variant)
Cover B: Mike S. Miller
Mike S. Miller double-page cover spread (Virgin Variant)
Cover C: Elliot Fernandez Secret Wars Homage
Elliot Fernandez virgin variant
Cover D: Kelsey Shannon
Kelsey Shannon variant
We're keeping the perks simple, and the prices as low as feasible, please check out the perks down the side of the campaign page!
Yes, this is technically a sequel to Monster Hunt 1, which featured Lonestar and the Unknown Soldiers, Graveyard Shift, and Jawbreakers. A few copies of the first volume will be made available through this campaign if you want to fill out your collection, but you won't need the first book to understand the second!  MONSTER HUNT is going to be the Blacklist Universe/independent cross-over book, much like Marvel Team-Up was the Spider-man cross-over book. They'll all be a lot of fun, and we've already got something in mind for Monster Hunt 3! But let's not get ahead of ourselves!
Please check the perks out for more specific details!
STRETCH GOALS will be announced as we near them, including new trading cards, postcards, stickers, and more!
Preview pages below!

Page 2. Nexus confronts his past...
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
This is the first major cross-over with another writer that we're doing at Blacklist, which means there's more fingers in the pie! So we're hoping to be able to make enough to make the books and make the partners happy enough to continue this series into the future!
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Welcome to my second Kickstarter 3D Printing Online Video Course: 
IMPROVE THE QUALITY OF YOUR 3D PRINTS
3D printers can sometimes be very fickle and your prints may not always come out as planned. In this course, you will learn how to improve your 3D print quality by better understanding different 3D printer and slicer settings. The course starts with the basics, such as leveling the bed and default slicer settings and moves on to more advanced topics such as Z-hop distance, calibrating the extruder, and cleaning the nozzle. 
- Save time and money by printing perfect 3D prints the first time.
- Get exclusive Kickstarter pricing.
- Minimize print failures by setting up you files properly
- All access pass to 3D Printer Academy Available today only! (Last day to save big on this course, previous courses, and future courses.
- Learn how to optimize print time and quality.

What you will learn in this online video course:
3D Printer bed leveling. (Sample lesson below)
What 3D printer settings to use for best print results.
How to avoid under-extrusion.
Object orientation for optimal print quality and strength.
How to clean or replace the nozzle.
Improving 3D printer bed adhesion.
Custom slicer settings for great print quality.
How to print fast and maintain quality finish.
Advanced slicer settings for specific situations.

Stretch Goals:
✅ Stretch goal #1: 
Downloadable STL Files For Testing Your 3D Printer's Capabilities.

✅ Stretch goal #2: 
Course Transcribed Into Written Lessons In English (For non-native English speakers.) 

Stretch goal #3: 
3D Printing Time Lapses Made Easy - *Bonus Lesson* (Unlocked at $2,000) 🔒

Stretch goal #4:  ?????


Sample Lesson 1: 
Sample Lesson 2:
FAQ:
When will the lessons be available?
- Lessons will be rolled out continually starting Nov. 2020
How many lessons will I receive?
- This series consists of 10 video lessons. All lessons in this course are focused on improving print quality.
Is this course vaporware?
- No. I have a strong record of finishing projects. This is my second Kickstarter project for 3D Printer Academy. With the funds raised from my last campaign, I was able to launch a fully featured online learning website for 3D Printer Academy. Check it out: www.3DPrinterAcademy.com The website has many finished lessons and downloadable resources.
Is there a sample lesson a can watch?
- Yes. My bed leveling lesson and ender 3 set-up (above) will show you the quality I am able to produce.
How do I access the course materials after the Kickstarter campaign has ended?
- All course materials will be available on the 3D Printer Academy website. Simply add the courses from this campaign to your cart, and at checkout use the special Kickstarter discount code.

campaign.story:
*11/12/2020 Update*
As of writing this, we're at 194% of funding for the Hoodcats 2021 Calendar & Catnip Kickers! We are SOOO close to hitting our 200% funding goal, so I'm gunna try and push us over the edge by adding a final stretch goal! If we get to 300% of EVERY BACKER will get a *STUBBS ONLY* bonus mini-2021-calendar, and we'll get to fix even more Hoodcats! Thanks to everyone who has pledged so far, we can't wait to see everyone at #CatManBingo tomorrow night!

*11/9/2020 Update*
Holy Hoodcats! We hit 100% funding! To celebrate, I'm going to host a #CatManBingo Game on Friday the 13th at 7PM Pacific! Check out the latest update to see how you can celebrate with us on Friday.
Now we're gunna talk about a couple of stretch goals, that I think we can hit!
If we hit 125% of our funding goal everyone will get a bonus Hoodcats Catnip Sticker Pack, including the Hoodcats logo stickers in regular, glow-in-the-dark, and a new *stardust* glitter variant!
If we hit 150% of our funding goal, I'll add a new 2in. Acrylic Hoodcats Pin to every order!
If we hit 200% of our funding goal, we'll be able to do all of the above AND sponsor the spay/neuter fees for 100 Hoodcats at Fix Our Ferals!
Regardless of where we get with funding, your pledge is helping spay and neuter Oakland's homeless cat population, and getting some pretty awesome stuff for you and your cat!
We really appreciate everyones support in these absolutely bonkers times, and look forward to celebrating with you all on Friday!

*Original Campaign Write-up Below*
Wow... 2020 is already in the home stretch?! 
WHERE DID THIS YEAR GO?!
DO WE STILL NEED CALENDARS? 
IS ANYONE ACTUALLY PLANNING ANYTHING FOR 2021?!? 
DO YOU STILL LOVE DIRTY OL STREET CATS AND SUPPORTING TNR?!?
These are the questions I'm looking at answering with the 2021 Hoodcats Kickstarter!
The Hoodcats 2021 Calendar will be a 12 month, 9in. x 9in., wall hanging calendar, featuring Oakland's finest felines, as seen by the Cat Man of West Oakland, and offer some special Kickstarter exclusive pre-order packs! 
This campaign will also be taking pre-orders for giant catnip kickers featuring ALL the boys! That's right! We'll be making giant catnip pillows, featuring all your favorite Hoodcats : Stubbs, Booty, Bud, Toughie, and Tommy! Pillows will be approximately 12 inches in height, which make them perfect size for bunny kick battles with your own cat, or there will also be an option to have your pillow be catnip-less, if you'd rather have a regular cat-drug-free Hoodcat at home.
A Stubbs pillow tries to blend in amongst the cats at The Catcade
And, as many of you are aware, we lost the legendary Hoodcat, Stubbs, this year to cancer... so I'm excited to bring back a final Stubbs memorial pack that will feature a kickstarter exclusive shirt, plus a 12 in. catnip kicker pillow of the legend himself, so your cat can play with Stubbs at home, or he can hang out on your couch!
My Chicago roommate [Big Rick] hugging a Catnip Stubbs prototype.
We'll also have special stretch goal bonuses that will unlock (i.e. pins, photo prints, bingo, etc.) as we reach various goals in the campaign, but we'll talk more on that soon!
Want to snag more copies of the calendar, a Hoodcats Hoodie, or a second Catnip Kicker Pillow to your pledge? Well now you can, thanks to the new Kickstarter Add-on's feature we're helping beta test!
It still blows me away at how much you folks love my little rag tag team of cats and the work we do here in West Oakland, and as always... thanks so much for all the support!
>^. .^<
Adam, Stubbs, Booty, Bud, Toughie, and Tommy
campaign.risks:
Risks and challenges
There's always a chance of hitting some snags in production what with plenty of businesses working on limited staffing due to Covid-19, but I feel pretty confident that we'll be able to make everything in a timely fashion.
Learn about accountability on Kickstarter

campaign.story:
Designed to provide smooth and consistent filament feeding for 3D Printing, especially for flexible filament.  
A Variety of Uses in Every Package! 
Installing the Cantilever Spool Holder:
Below we present how our holder compares against current holders on the market.
Using our patent pending spool adapters, the filament spool is held securely on the holder, preventing it from wobbling and allowing it to rotate smoothly, minimizing the pull on the filament. 
Assembly is simple and the product is sturdy, no need to worry about your filament spool falling or rolling off the holder. Only smooth turns for better prints! 

Specifications:
Our Patent pending Filament Spool Holders come in two sizes.  So we could cover as many spools as possible!  Our Standard Holder with cantilever mounting piece can handle most 1kg filament spools.   While our Large Spool Holder can handle spools of up to 5kg filament.  Below is the dimensions for both the holders and its compatible spools.  The left side is for the Standard Spool Holder (SH200AE), and the right side is the Large Spool Holder (SH350A).

Pictured below are the two packages we will be offering and everything included!
Our Standard Holder package comes with a cantilever mounting piece  which both hold 1kg filament spools, as well as two sets of spool adapters. 
The Large Holder package includes the large holder and two sets of adapters.
See our Reward Tier section for information on backing and package combos.  

 International Backers
Our filament holders will be shipped worldwide.  For European backers, we will ship from a warehouse in Europe.  For backers in North America, we will ship from a warehouse in Canada.  For the backers in other regions, we will ship from a warehouse close to that region.  Due to the regulations applied to each country, VAT/duties may incur upon receipt of your filament holder.  These fees are the responsibility of each international backer.  
Distributors: If you would like to work with us to distribute PrintDry products around the world, please contact us at sales@printdry.com
Thanks: PrintDry team would like to thank all our backers.  We sincerely appreciate your support and look forward to bringing you more 3D printing products in the future.

Click HERE to check out our website or too see what other cool products we offer! (our past Kickstarter successes thanks to you wonderful backers!)
Check Us Out On Social Media!
Our Twitter Page! 
Our Facebook Page! 
Our Instagram!

campaign.story:
As we sought out face masks that were creative, inspiring and meaningful - and didn’t just have an all-over print - we came up empty-handed. We saw a need for a face mask that not only covers your face, but allows you to add a sense of personal taste, fashion and inspiration to your outfit. 
ZenMoon Masks are a breath of fresh air, a reminder to breathe and to trust that everything is as it should be. The symbols and designs are beautiful, subtle and perfect for those looking for a more sophisticated way to present themselves in public.
The Fibonacci Spiral is one of the oldest known symbols. It is a powerful yet spiritual symbol, connecting us to Nature, our Earth and the Galaxy. Our Life Force Energy, known as Kundalini, is a Spiral that flows from the base of our spine. It represents God/Goddess, Life, Energy and Evolving Journey. 
The Spiral is found in human physiology, animals, plants and minerals in nature as well as weather patterns. This sacred symbol reminds us of our ever evolving journey in life.
The Spirals in our designs are clockwise - sending energy out, and counterclockwise – bringing energy in.
The mandala is a diagram, chart or geometric pattern that represents the cosmos metaphysically or symbolically; a time-microcosm of the universe. It can also represent wholeness and a model for the organizational structure of life itself, a cosmic diagram that shows the relation to the infinite and the world that extends beyond our minds and bodies.  
Mandalas may be employed for focusing attention and establishing a sacred space as an aid to meditation.
Sacred geometry ascribes symbolic and sacred meanings to certain geometric shapes and certain geometric proportions. 
The geometry used in the design and construction of religious structures such as churches, temples, mosques, religious monuments, altars, and tabernacles is often considered sacred.
The Fibonacci Spiral connects us to Nature, our Earth and the Galaxy. This sacred symbol reminds us of our ever evolving journey in life.The mandala is a diagram, chart or geometric pattern that represents the cosmos metaphysically or symbolically; a time-microcosm of the universe. 
Merging these two designs brings together Nature and our Earth with the organizational structure of life itself.

Vision, Self Expression, Spirituality, Awakening, Integrity, Freedom, Guidance, Protection & Watchfulness are all represented by the peacock. 
In Greco-Roman mythology, the Peacock tail has the “eyes” of the stars. In Hinduism, the Peacock is associated with Lakshmi who represents patience, kindness and luck.
A connection to several of the most important sacred symbols. While the sun represents the masculine, strength, and power, the moon finds balance with the feminine, calmness, and nurturing.
The 3rd eye gazes inward towards the self as it connects to universal awareness, and the Fibonacci spiral represents the life force energy and eternal sign of the creative and organizing principles of the universe.
We are a woman-owned design and production company with more than 25 years of experience. We have brought products to life, from concept to design to manufacturing, for some of the biggest companies across the globe. 
Now, we are bringing products we believe in directly to you! We value living an inspired, mindful, and compassionate life, and our goal is to deliver that inspiration to your doorstep through beautifully-crafted face masks.
Here’s a quick look at the structure and quality of our Masks.
Follow us and share our campaign on social media!
